titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation prohibiting the publishing, dispersing and reading of a declaration or remonstrance, drawen by some committees of the Commons-House of the late dissolued Parliament, and intended to haue beene preferred by them to His Maiestie.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: "Giuen at His Maiesties Palace of Westminster, the sixteenth day of Iune, in the second yeere of His Maiesties Reigne of Great Britaine, France and Ireland."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.

person.persName: Printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie
